resources.string: This application is the part of research project named \'An integrated disaster response management system\'.Idea behind this project is to provide timely response to the effected people by any disaster(flood,earthquake,fire or ememergency situations) in effected areas. For timely help people in disaster effected area,this application is named as \'Smart Route\' is used by rescue providers. This application provide shortest path to drivers of rescue services(lifters,ambulance, fire brigade) to reach and response people in disaster timely.
